title: Sports
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: John Robertson, a 2-Time European Cup Winner With Nottingham Forest, Dies
items.description: John Robertson, a former Scotland winger who won the European Cup twice with Nottingham Forest, has died.

items.title: Andy Reid Salutes 'Phenomenal' Travis Kelce Ahead of Possible Final Home Game
items.description: Travis Kelce hasn't said if this will be his final season, but that didn't stop Andy Reid from sharing kind words about him this week.

items.title: Eagles' Saquon Barkley 'Couldn't Stand' HC Nick Sirianni Before Joining Team
items.description: Nick Sirianni got on Saquon Barkley's nerves when he was with the Giants. Now, Barkley is calling him the NFL's best coach.

items.title: Washington Huskies Star WR Denzel Boston Declares for 2026 NFL Draft
items.description: FOX Sports NFL Draft expert Rob Rang has Denzel Boston getting selected in the first round of the 2026 NFL Draft.

items.title: MLB Free Agency Rumors, Buzz: Yankees, Mets and Royals Eyeing OF Austin Hays
items.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

items.title: 'That's what we sign up for': Five tales -- and a few gripes -- from playing on Christmas
items.description: With NBA Christmas games on the horizon, stars and coaches share their stories and gripes about playing on the holiday.

items.title: Bah humbug: An NFL holiday story, featuring festive names from around the league
items.description: From Jaylin Noel to Julius Chestnut, the fictional Holiday Bowl is full of holiday cheer as told by Rich Cimini.

items.title: Five NBA games, three NFL games, one loaded Christmas Day slate: Everything you need to know
items.description: We're previewing all eight Christmas Day games across two sports with picks, predictions, storylines and more.

items.title: Follow live: Cowboys, Commanders face off on Christmas Day
'Mr. Eligible': The growing fraternity of NFL sixth offensive linemen
items.description: NFL teams are using sixth O-linemen in more plays this season, and we're highlighting, yep -- six of them.
